channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 01:03 Alarm lifted in Zolotonisky district. Stay tuned for further updates.
item.description: 游릭 01:03 Alarm lifted in Zolotonisky district. Stay tuned for further updates. #Zolotonisky_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
